author: Your Name
install_msg: Thanks for installing the User Tracker cog! Use `[p]help UserTracker` to see available commands.
name: UserTracker
short: Tracks and logs activities of specified users in real-time.
description: This cog allows you to track and log activities of specified users in real-time, including messages, voice state changes, and status updates.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores Discord User IDs for users that are set to be tracked. No personal data is stored.
